main.name: Kevin Wissink
main.description: Who has a passion for software, and learning all the wonderful ways it can be used
main.bio: I'm a hard-working, detail-oriented, and collaborative Computer Engineering major at Texas A&M University. Experienced software engineer with excellent teamwork, critical thinking, and communication skills. Dedicated to using a broad skillset to find secure and reliable software solutions.
main.contactmessage: If you have any questions please feel free to reach out to me here.

testimonials.text: I hired Kevin as a DevOps intern focused on our FEDRAMP initiative. Kevin rapidly found his stride working on three different projects for the Infoblox organization. In addition to completing his assigned work, he picked up an automation project from another team member to carry across the finish line. While Covid did its best to derail Kevin's internship, his solid remote communication skills and his willingness to receive feedback and improve will serve him well in his future endeavours.
